"suwothsawaya" namin nam kara athi mema wadasatahana yatathe usata sarilana barak pawathwagena yama, aaharayata ganna lunu pramanaya awama kirima, panirasa kama sima kirima, thel ha santhruptha meda adangu bandina lada thel aaharayata ganima sima kirima, dinakata elawalu ha palathuru gram 400 k wath aaharayata ekkara ganima, mathpan ha dum wati bhawithayen walakima, rudhira pidanaya 140/ 90 mattamata aduwen pawathwa ganima ha dinapatha muluÊkayama wehesa winadi 30 k pamana wyayama kirima yana supiri ilakka 8 janathawa atharata gena yama sidu kere.

ambalangoda kalapaye pasal muddara samaja arambae.dakunu palath garu adhyapana amathya chandima rasaputhra mathithumage pradanathwayen ambalangoda kalapa adhyapana karyalayata ayath pasal wala widuhalpathi raswima 2015-06-25 dina ahungalla rajapaksha maha widuhal shrawanagaraye di pawathwini.kalapa adhyapana karyalayehi sewaka sewikawange sahabhagithwayen paladayitha wadasatahanak 2015-07-17 dina ema aayathanaye di pawath wuna.ambalangoda kalapaye siyaluma pasal sandaha web adawi thanimath danata pawathina web adawi yawath kalina kota nisi parida pawathwa gena yama sandaha kadinam wadasatahanak arambae.kalapa karyalaya magin nikuth karana paniduda kshanikawa obage durakathanaya wetha laba ganime wadasatahanak arambae.
